articles.description: Rajnish Kumar and T V Mohandas Pai, who joined edtech firm Byju’s advisory council in July last year, will depart from the statutory body.

articles.author: Naman Suri, Nehal Chaliawala
articles.title: JSW Steel expects margins to improve in FY25 on cooling input costs: Joint MD | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The Sajjan-led company has proposed  ₹20,000 crore of capital expenditure for FY25, as it aims to raise its manufacturing capacity to 50 mt by 2030, from more than 29 mt currently.
articles.content: New Delhi/Mumbai: JSW Steel expects to improve margins in the ongoing fiscal year, driven by cooling input costs, rising steel prices, and enhanced operational efficiencies, Jayant Acharya, joint man… [+4099 chars]

articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: Elon Musk's Tesla 'silent'; yet to inform government about plans to enter India: Official | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Elon Musk's Tesla is yet to reveal its India plans. Musk postponed his visit, citing heavy obligations.
articles.content: Elon Musk's electric carmaker Tesla is 'silent' and yet to communicate its India plans to the Centre under the new EV policy, an official told news agency PTI on Friday. The tech billionaire was sche… [+2415 chars]

articles.title: ITC's Sanjiv Puri assumes Presidency of CII for 2024-25 - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Memani, holding the position of Chairman for EY (Ernst & Young) in the India region, is a prominent figure in the global professional services sector.
articles.content: Sanjiv Puri, the Chairman and Managing Director of ITC, has been appointed as the President of the Confederation of Indian Industry (CII) for the term 2024-25, announced the chamber on Sunday. Puri s… [+1346 chars]

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Dr Reddy's, Sun Pharma, Aurobindo recall products in US - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The USFDA stated that another drug firm FDC Ltd is recalling 3,82,104 units of Timolol Maleate Ophthalmic Solution, used to treat glaucoma, in the American market due to ”Defective Container”.
